comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The Dartmouth vs. Carlisle Indians football game of 1913 was played in New York City, at the Polo Grounds, on November 15, 1913. Carlisle won, 35-10.

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for the date. The Bain caption card also shows "1913". I'll have all records associated with images of this Dartmouth vs. Carlisle game updated.
